casebody.data:
NEW MIGHTY U.S. TRUST, et al., Petitioners
v.
Robert SHI, as Executor of the Will of Yueh-Lan Wang, et al. No. 19-232 Supreme Court of the United States. October 21, 2019 Motion of Professor George A. Bermann for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied. Justice Kavanaugh took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
